summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of KinesioCRM application. Backend API testing: 19/19 tests passed (100%). Frontend testing: All major user flows tested and working correctly including authentication, client management, visit tracking, filtering, and statistics.

minor_issues.issue: Visits YTD and Last 30 Days return 0 when visits are dated in past years (2024) but current year is 2026
minor_issues.impact: Dashboard KPIs may show 0 even when visits exist, if visits are not in current year
minor_issues.note: This is expected behavior based on date filtering logic, but may confuse users

ui_bugs.issue: KPI values include the label text (e.g., 'Total Clients0' instead of just '0')
ui_bugs.note: Functional but displays incorrectly. The text_content includes both label and value.

design_issues.issue: Registration is disabled after first admin account is created. Error message 'Admin user already exists. Registration disabled.' is shown.
design_issues.note: This is by design (single admin system), but the UX could be improved by hiding the registration option entirely once an admin exists, rather than showing an error after form submission.

passed_tests: Protected routes (redirect to login when not authenticated)
